notes:
[Topan Freeblade] is the pick as it's the best white common, and is kind of format defining: Every deck needs to have a plan for how they're going to deal with a turn-two [Topan Freeblade] (though I suppose that plan might be "lose").

[Skysnare Spider] represents the polar opposite strategy as it's huge and board dominating, if you survive to cast it.
